name: Algor PEW PEW
description:
Algor PEW PEW is the first game from Algorhythm Project which will bring you a new experience in rogue-lite bullet-hell survival genre.

Main Mechanics


Music X Survival
Enjoy your favourite songs from Algorhythm Project in 8-bit version and survive until the last song however, the more intense the song is, the stronger enemies are.

Medley mode
Pick the songs, Create a playlist and dive to the stage with your songs.
Create your own stage and beat your own challenge!



Party member
Once you rescue an ARP, he/she will grant you his/her power and fight along side you.
